description: Royal Inn Hotel offers accommodation in conveniently based on the Shahrah-e-Faisal Highway in KarƒÅchi. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant.

name: Karachi Marriott HotelOpens in new window
description: Located opposite Frere Hall and Park, the 5-star Karachi Marriott Hotel offers modern and luxurious rooms with a flat-screen cable TV. It features 3 dining options, spa and outdoor swimming pool.

name: Four Square by WI Hotels
description: Situated in the D.H.A. District of Karachi, Four Square by WI Hotels offers a garden and a terrace.

name: Hotel Excelsior Karachi
description: Hotel Excelsior Karachi is situated in Karachi, in the Saddar Town district. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi.

name: Hotel InnOpens in new window
description: Hotel Inn has a garden and a terrace in Karachi. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property.

name: Ramada by Wyndham Karachi Creek
description: Offering panoramic views of the sea, Ramada by Wyndham Karachi Creek is set in Karachi. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant.

name: Pearl Continental Hotel, Karachi
description: Located in the commercial centre of south central Karachi, The 5-star Pearl Continental Hotel offers luxurious and modern rooms with free Wi-Fi. 6 dining options and an indoor pool await guests.

name: Hotel Mehran
description: Set in the Shahrah-e-Faisal district of Karachi, Hotel Mehran provides a fitness centre. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Free private parking is available and the hotel also offers car hire for guests who want to explore the surrounding area.

name: Avari Tower Karachi
description: Avari Tower features an outdoor pool, spa and fitness centre. Offering modern air conditioned rooms, the property provides free WiFi in all areas. It is 15 km from Jinnah Airport. Rooms come with a flat-screen cable/satellite TV, safety deposit box and minibar. Shower facilities are included in private bathrooms. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can assist guests with currency exchange and laundry service. The hotel has a tennis court and business centre.
